task.summary: Implemented TKWAR-23. Discovered a problem with unit testing due from TKWAR-13: tests not running
Fixed the issue with Scalatest. Completed and tested TKWAR-23. Played with the simulation. Restructured few directories
Added documentation to GIT. Improved sight architecture. Fixed minor bugs and performance issues. Issue: the fitness has become a very low value
Completed the sight system, fixed exceptions, added events and simple counters in the world.
Completed the sight system, fixed exceptions, added events and simple counters in the world.
Extracted a new interface for InteractiveObjects.
Applied standard code format to all the sources
Started the implementation of the Quadtree. Refactored the Container section with a better structure used by the Quadtree
Not working implementation of the Quadtree, but I want a snapshot before changing strategy. Played with fitness and put a timer for competition measurment

option.name: searchQuery
option.value: assignee = currentUser() and resolution = Unresolved order by updated
